<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
	<style>
		body{
      background-color:lightblue;
    }
    .box {

			width: 500px;
			height: 500px;
			position: relative;
			left: 50px;
		}

		.myDiv {


			position: absolute;
			width: 100px: height: 40px;
			left: 10px;
			top: 20px;
			display: block;
		}

		.box.image {
			position: absolute;
			width: 500px;
			left: 10px;
			top: 20px;
			vertical-align: middle;
		}

		.image:hover+.myDiv {
			color: orange;
			font-weight: bold;

		}
	</style>
</head>

<body>

	<div class="box">
		<br>
      
     <img class="image" src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" style="margin:150px">
     <div class="myDiv">
       <h1>My Special Div</h1>
       </div>
    </div>

</body>
